tweets.content:
Yesterdayâ€™s hottest topic was Mr. CJ, the â€œyandereâ€ founder, furiously exposing the hidden rules of token listings. I thought it was going to be a â€œLin Chong storming the White Tiger Hallâ€ kind of moment.

After watching it, I was speechless. I just want to ask â€” what brand of plastic bag can hold that much air? Taking an Alpha template and saying you rejected Binance is like saying you once turned down Daniel Wu.

And then claiming that the liaison would be firedâ€¦ You admire Kaito, so you sent him your Alpha? Rightâ€¦

That said, Iâ€™ve noticed most founders donâ€™t really understand the weight of Binanceâ€™s product credibility and its user base.

A good reference is @zerobasezk.

Let me share what we actually gained through our Booster collaboration.

1% Pre-TGE Launch

About 30,000 BN KYC users participated, raising 80 million USD. Each user who maxed out 3 BNB received 330 ZBT. You even needed an Alpha score of 218 to qualify. I usually grind Alpha myself, but 218 was god-level â€” unreachable for me. I actually felt a bit embarrassed, like we were giving too few tokens.

3% Booster Earn

Roughly 120,000 BN KYC users joined, contributing 520 million USDT. Just during the campaign period, we made 3 million USD in net profit â€” 400,000 USD came from instant-withdrawal fees alone. You can check all that on-chain. I remember laughing in bed those two nights â€” it was just perfectly executed.

Soon weâ€™ll announce our next step.

I think many of you have been through Alpha IDO Booster projects â€” airdrop some tokens, hype it up, then Mario says â€œoff workâ€

But if you only treat BN Booster as a data-boosting stepping stone to get listed, youâ€™re wasting it. You can collaborate with the wallet team to design activities that actually support your business â€” or even make direct profit from Booster.

Of course, that requires your business itself to be profitable. If you lie to yourself, youâ€™ll pay for it. The more users and money flow in, the more you lose.
Iâ€™m still studying Alpha. I believe:

New project 4Ã— points for the first 30 days

Alpha pool strategies

These will be key to breaking through. You can either use the rules to deepen liquidity or use multiplier points to farm fees â€” even pool design has many tricks.

People need to know their place.

Others donâ€™t respect you because youâ€™re excellent;
they respect you because they are excellent.

Iâ€™m glad you didnâ€™t, and apparently never will, make it onto BN Alpha.

You bring everyone so much joy when you leave the room. Bye bye ğŸ‘‹
